name: Binary Tetris
description:
This is a very small Game i did for the MiniJam 47. The theme was Internet and the Limitation was Everything must die in one hit. The game ended up being way less polished then i would have wished for, so sorry for that. The game plays a bit like Tetris, there are blocks falling down and you have to arrange them to create a binary code that is equal to the decimal number shown on the right of the "playingfield". 

PS: There may be still be some bugs in the game but they shouldn't make the game unplayable.
